Package com.example.nostalgia

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ItemClickSupport.OnItemClickListener  
    ItemClickSupport.OnItemLongClickListener  
    MemoryListFragment.Callbacks  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DatePickerFragment
    Setup of the getting and saving date from the date dialog in memory
    ExampleInstrumentedTest
    Instrumented test, which will execute on an Android device.
    GalleryViewPagerAdapter
    Sets up the zoom in and swipe left/right of photos and videos in a memory.
    Introduction
    Appears when the user visits the app for the first time.
    Creates a viewPager to show what the user sees and sets it up to its adapter.
    Uses TabLayout to show dots indicating where the user is in the viewPager.
    IntroPagerAdapter
    Setup of Introduction viewPager adapter.
    ItemClickSupport
    Provides methods to click/long-click items of RecyclerView.
    Used for zooming in photo/video when clicked and an option to delete if long clicked.
    Copied from stackOverflow code.
    Launcherclass
    Activity to show logo everytime the app opens
    Memory
    Stores the title, details, event, date & time, and concatenated filePaths of photos and videos seperated by ",".
    MemoryFragment
    Hooksup user interface and updates data for a selected Memory depending on user actions.
    MemoryLab
    Stores and retrieves memories in a database.
    MemoryListActivity
    Contains the Navigation Drawer containing a welcome text, event lists and settings to change these two.
    Displays the list of memories user has added in its own fragment MemoryListFragment
    MemoryListFragment
    Contains list layout of RecyclerView and floating action button to show all memories and to add a new one.
    MemoryPagerActivity
    Contains ViewPager and record of all Memories.
    Enables users to swipe left or right for next or before Memory
    MyGalleryAdapter
    Setting up the gridLayout: images and videos.
    Gets images from Bitmap decoder and videos from Uris
    SingleFragmentActivity
    Extend this if an activity needs a fragment on its own.
    TimePickerFragment
    Setup of the getting and saving time from the time dialog in memory
    UserSettingsActivity
    Setup of allowing users to change their name or their event preferences.
